MesoPy docs¶

MesoPy is a small pure python wrapper around the MesoWest (http://mesowest.utah.edu/) API. It is useful for retrieving meteorological data at over 40,000 observation stations in the United States.

Requirements:¶

MesoPy requires the ‘requests’ library for making calls to the MesoWest API. Both Python 2 and 3 are supported.
